name: Jets Killer
description:
Jets Killer is an action-packed game where you are in charge of defending your military base from enemy helicopters that are attacking.

You will have to choose one of the three powerful bazookas available and use it to the fullest to eliminate the threat. With realistic sound effects and animations, you will feel like you are in the heat of the battle.

The gameplay is simple, yet challenging. You will have to aim carefully and calculate the trajectory of the missile to hit the moving targets. As you progress through the game, the difficulty level increases, and you will have to be quick on your feet to dodge enemy fire while taking down their helicopters.
With its engaging gameplay and exciting action, Jets Killer is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Whether you are a casual gamer or a hardcore fan of action games, this one is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end.

Game features :
- 3 types of bazookas
- Battle against waves of enemy jets
- Military camp attacked
- Limited time
